title: To Name A Baby
content:
[[collapsible show="► To Name A Baby" hide="▼ To Name A Baby"]]

"Well, the doctor said its going to be a girl!"

"Have you thought much about names yet?"

"Not really. We had a list but it's hard when you're picking for both boy and girl names. Although we can officially throw out **##green|Drew##** and **##green|Kyle##**."

"Well, it's all good. You have a few months to figure it out still. I'll see you around!"

----

"Honey, is there a reason you're so set against this?"

"I'm sorry I just don't think **##green|Alexandria##** is a good name! It just feels too... like it's just too much."

"Ok, ok. We can pick another name. How about **##green|Sarah##**? Or maybe **##green|Karen##**?"

"Those are both... they're fine. I'm sorry. I'm stressing about this too much."

"It's ok, dear. Maybe we should just sleep for tonight."

"Right. We can figure this out later."

----

"Congratulations on the delivery!"

"Thank you!"

"She's such a cute little one, isn't she? You finally decided on a name for her?"

"We did! We went with

----

Inside of a hollow tree, a fungus fell off the wall and began to fester and grow. First it formed a leg, and then another. And then two arms with four fingers each. Bright yellow eyes pierced what soon became the head. As its mouth formed, it learned of taste. Its mind flooded with thoughts of food. Something sweet, but also bitter. Like a tea with just a little more sugar.

Yes, an **##green|Eleanor##** would be quite delectable.
[[/collapsible]]
author: Captain Kirby
